resources.string: Getting better can be tough, disposing of your old medications shouldn\'t be.
Tractine can help you identify and properly remove pharmaceuticals from your household.
Take a picture with your camera to receive an explanation on medication type and disposal options.
Disclaimer: This system works with the FDA \and DEA websites, if unsure check your local ordinances as they may conflict with the information presented here.

This product uses publicly available data from the U.S. National Library of Medicine (NLM), National Institutes of Health, Department of Health and Human Services; NLM is not responsible for the product and does not endorse or recommend this or any other product.
Click the menu above to get started!
